attributes.action: David Cameron to remain as PM
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron led the Conservative's for nearly 11 years - only Stanley Baldwin, Lady Thatcher and Sir Winston Churchill spent longer as Prime Minister.
attributes.background:
Being the only competent person  to guide us through these uncertain times..
He has always had a positive, upbeat, vision of Britain.

There does not appear to be any other candidate with the experience to take the UK forward
